name: Java CI Feature

on:
  push:
    branches: [ feature/* ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ feature/* ]

jobs:
  build:

    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v3
    - name: Set up JDK 1.11
      uses: actions/setup-java@v2
      with:
        java-version: '11'
        distribution: 'adopt'

    - name: Test
      run: mvn --batch-mode -Dmaven.test.failure.ignore=true test
